scripts.reports:clear: if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\reports rmdir /q /s cypress\reports
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos && if exist reports rmdir /q /s reports
